definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. to 輕軌|轻轨[qing1 gui3]
pinyin: qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1

sentences.english: This paper also discusses the framework of forecasting the induced passenger flow volume in URT.
sentences.chinese: 给出了城市轨道交通诱增交通量预测框架。

sentences.english: Finally, this paper forecasts the urban railway transport demand and rectifies the result according to the remainder of traffic demand.
sentences.chinese: 最后根据剩余交通需求进行轨道交通规划。

sentences.english: Positively going in for urban rail transportation equipment manufacture domestically.
sentences.chinese: 积极研究城市轨道交通设备的国产化问题等等。

sentences.english: It has a very broad prospect for the application of the technology in Guangzhou urban mass transit syste…
sentences.chinese: 该技术在广州市轨道交通领域具有广阔应用前景。

sentences.english: While an additional 60 billion, one third will be used for rail transit construction.
sentences.chinese: 而追加的60亿元中，三分之一将用于轨道交通建设。

sentences.english: Shanghai Urban Rail Transit (SURT) system has entered a new era of networking operation.
sentences.chinese: 上海城市轨道交通已经进入网络化运营时代。

sentences.english: If disagrees with the reply, the passenger may appeal to the MCRCAS.
sentences.chinese: 乘客对答复有异议的，可以向市轨道交通处申诉。

sentences.english: In this paper, the United States the re-development of rail transportation focal point for research.
sentences.chinese: 本文以美国轨道交通的再次发展为中心点进行研究。

sentences.english: The Beijing urban rail transit network plan was revised in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 北京城市轨道交通规划线网于2002年进行了修订。

sentences.english: This paper also discusses the framework of forecasting the induced passenger flow volume…
sentences.chinese: 给出了城市轨道交通诱增交通量预测框架。

sentences.english: but, this city has a long way to go in railway transportation.
sentences.chinese: 但这座城市在轨道交通上还有很长的路要走。

sentences.english: The development situations of rail transit in large-scale airport are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国外大型机场中轨道交通的发展现状。

sentences.english: Ballasted track is the most used track type in ground track of urban mass transit in existing "Code for the Design of Metro".
sentences.chinese: 有碴轨道是城市轨道交通地面线最常采用的轨道结构。

sentences.english: Pantograph is one of the most important parts of urban rail vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 受电弓是城市轨道交通车辆的重要部件之一。

sentences.english: Knorr-Bremse Group is a famous group in railway & truck industry.
sentences.chinese: 克诺尔集团是轨道交通行业的领先者。

sentences.english: China has entered the golden age of large-scale construction of Urban Railway Transport.
sentences.chinese: 我国已进入大规模城市轨道交通建设的黄金时期。

definition: light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
public transportation/mass transit/abbr. for 公共交通[gong1 gong4 jiao1 tong1]
ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
